name: Sprocket (itch)
description:
Sprocket is about a steampunk freedom fighter who wants the world peace. Your task as the freedom fighter is it to slay the dragons.

School of Games (Cologne) – Game Jam | 18.12.2017 – 21.12.2017
• Random groups out of 2
• Normally 1 Programmer and 1 Artist
The game is made by Henry & Julia
